description: Logs collected from Kubernetes, stored in Loki

targets.expr: sum(http_request_duration_seconds_count{status_code=~"^5..$", container=~"servicefoundry-server.*", path=~"$path", method=~"$method", namespace="truefoundry"}) by (method, path, status_code)

panels.title: Requests taking more than 300MS P95 in the last 24 hours

targets.expr: sum(rate(http_request_duration_seconds_count{status_code!~"^5..$", container=~"servicefoundry-server.*", path=~".*", method=~".*", namespace="truefoundry"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum (rate(http_request_duration_seconds_count{container=~"servicefoundry-server.*", path=~".*", method=~".*", namespace="truefoundry"}[$__rate_interval])) * 100

panels.description: It is global i.e. for all queries
